name: Vugliskr: Zombie Rampage
description:
BETA VERSION. Game under active development.
Consider it as early access type of game.

Tired of  Free to play shooters with tons of advertisements at every action/level/upgrade?
To many times hit into 'payment wall' after investing many hours into gameplay?
Pay 1 coffee cup equivalent and play.
Good old classic style shooterare waiting for you.

0. Kill zombies with automatic rifles or frag grenades.
1. Collect crystals to activate ZIP lines.
2. Travel at ZIP lines to hidden level areas.
3. Open treasuse chests to collect keys.
4. Find Exit from level.
5. Interact with other SWAT members.
6. Have fun.

Requirements: 9.0+Android or higher. At least 2GB RAM.
For comfort gaming and best gaming experience we recomending smartphone/tablet with Antutu benchmark result at least 80-100K.

Planned 8-10 level of thunderbolt zombie rampage action.
Estimated playing time - 2+ hours.

Zombie behaviour and collectables location are heavily randomized - each game session will be unique.

Please leave you comments, help us to improve game and complete BETA testing stage.

Thank you.

Sergey, BadGamesOk.
